They show understanding and empathy towards each other, creating a positive and encouraging dynamic in their interactions.

They offer encouragement, advice, and help in balancing work at the local grocery store with basketball practice. Classmates A appreciates the support and understanding from Classmates B, creating a strong bond between them. Additionally, Classmates A shares updates on their progress and experiences, showcasing their dedication and hard work towards their goals.
